title: Fizz Counterplay: and other League Myths.
body:
First he dashes! OK!
Then he becomes untargetable. Awesome! This means something to me.

But wait, theres more, then he becomes invulnerable again! {{item:3157}} 

Then he knocks you up with a Shark! This is awesome.

Oh wait, he can dash some more! He flashes! He becomes untargetable again.

Play him as a Tank? Congratulations, you are now a Demigod if you make it to 2 or 3 items! Fk logic, I'm fizz!

{{champion:90}} Stare the little rodent to death.

Malzahar banned? 

Don't die once or the snowball becomes unstoppable. Powerspiking with a Sheen is a bit ridiculous. Maybe you should nerf him since there's a 10% CDR reduc on it and that for Fizz is better than sex.

replies.body:
Tank Fizz is useless, it used to be good a long time ago then it was nerfed out of existence alongside AD Fizz.
Just like Ekko recently got.
Tank Fizz literally does nothing unless if you land the ult, which yeah, that's going to happen someday.

You want counter play to Fizz? Play Yorick. {{champion:83}} 
Hell how about you actually expand your champion pool and learn more about champs that aren't played as much instead of focusing on the 15 champions that get played regularly?

I can tell you now, Fizz will NEVER kill Yorick unless if he lands his ult at the start of the fight.
Once Yorick gets his {{item:3071}} Fizz usually can't even kill him after landing his ult on Yorick.

I hate Fizz as much as the next person, but he's not difficult to deal with at all.

I had someone the other day complaining that we could never win because Vlad {{champion:8}} got fed early, I told him to get a Mortal Reminder {{item:3033}}.
Know what happens to Vlad when you get just {{item:3123}} ? He disappears from the game permanently.
Gone.
Most Vlads will rage quit because Grievous Wounds completely destroys champions like Vlad that rely on healing.

People complain about Tank Meta, yet fail to realise that actual tanks aren't being played in the game.
This so called "Tank Meta" is picking an assassin champion and playing them with 2 tank items.
While real Tanks like Malphite {{champion:54}} Rammus {{champion:33}} Sejuani {{champion:113}} or Zac {{champion:154}} die instantly in fights, especially if there is a Vayne.
Literally the "Tank Meta" can't exist because Vayne exists.

You want to talk about OP?
Look at Vayne. {{champion:67}} 
12% of your health, your maximum health done to you as true damage.
24% if she is using Rageblade.{{item:3124}} 
And hell let's not even get into how she works with Blade of the Ruined King {{item:3153}} .
The amount of times I've died in three auto attacks to a Vayne as a full tank Rammus with nearly 500 armour, 200 MR and 4000+ health is ridiculous.

You know what happens if I use that exact same Rammus build against Fizz?
Fizz dies, I live on 3000HP.

Vayne hard-counters tanks... what are you even going on about? You cannot compare Vayne to an AP assassin.

No. (and you completely glossed over everything I said)

Vayne does not counter tanks.
She makes them utterly pointless to play.
An ADC/Mage/Bruiser will last longer against Vayne than a Tank will.

Tanks do not exist, as long as Vayne is present in any capacity.

"Oh but that's her job"

No, it really isn't.

There are plenty of other champions that are Anti-Tank like Kog'Maw {{champion:96}} Aatroxx {{champion:266}} Anivia {{champion:34}} Fiora {{champion:114}} Master Yi {{champion:11}} Trundle {{champion:48}} (Trundle is probably THE best Anti-Tank champ in the game).
Yet none of these champions make it completely pointless to play as a Tank champion.

Hell even Trundle with his ult that rips tank stats from the target and buffs himself with them, isn't as un-fun and horrible to play against as Vayne is.

You even have people like Doublelift.
People who are famous for playing Vayne.
These people say that Vayne is a toxic champion and that she desperately needs a nerf/rework.
